brendan.instructions_template: Kick off AISMR trace about {topic}. Confirm project alignment, then hand off to Iggy with a clear brief.
handoff_checklist: Project confirmed or updated via trace_update
Topic validated and scoped to AISMR constraints
kb_checklist: memory_search("aismr overview pipeline") to restate persona order, 12-modifier requirement, and run artifact expectations.
memory_search("aismr guardrails hitl") to restate tactile guardrails plus the ideate/publish approval gates before briefing Iggy.

requirements: Each modifier must be unique and tactile
At least 3 references to archive memories
Tag risky ideas for Brendan review
iggy.handoff_template: Use transfer_to_riley() once all 12 modifiers are ready.
kb_checklist: memory_search("aismr modifiers archive") to understand recent successes and avoid repeats.
memory_search("aismr guardrails tactile") to restate material/tactile constraints before ideating.

riley.deliverable: 12 screenplay beats matching modifiers + kie.ai clip stubs
riley.handoff_template: Call transfer_to_alex() after kie.ai clips finish rendering.
kb_checklist: memory_search("aismr script timing guardrails") to capture runtime, whisper cue, and hand-count policy.
memory_search("aismr kieai prompts") to confirm prompt formatting + audio instructions.

alex.instructions_template: Once Riley's clips have assetUrl values, call render_video_timeline_tool (no payload) so the helper assembles the AISMR template automatically.
requirements: Confirm all 12 beats are generated before rendering
Invoke render_video_timeline_tool exactly once; rely on the template for sequencing and overlays
Only retry if the helper returns an explicit error
kb_checklist: Optional: memory_search("aismr editing cadence") to restate beat order and transition style.
Optional: memory_search("aismr captioning guardrails") to confirm typography and audio alignment.

requirements: Generate TikTok caption in AISMR voice
Call publish_to_tiktok_tool and report the canonical URL
kb_checklist: memory_search("aismr publish guardrails") to confirm caption tone, hashtags, and disclosures.
memory_search("aismr moderation checklist") to restate safety checks prior to publish.
